topic.title: Access Control - documentation coming soon!
topic.shortdesc: cityEHR has a role-based access control system that can be configured to restrict user access to specific functions, based on the role of the user. In addition, users can be restricted so that they can access only the data of patients who are assigned to the care team(s) of which that user is a member.

section.title: Restricting Access to Care Team Patients
